headline: 2025-10-27 — arXiv authors published a paper that introduced 1 generalized 'interaction variable' for electric energy systems and derived 2 control implementations (Feedback Linearizing Control (FBLC) and Sliding Mode Control (SMC)) as concrete methods.

2025-10-28 — arXiv authors illustrated the proposed design on 1 RLC circuit with a controllable voltage source (single-circuit experimental / illustrative model) to demonstrate applicability to a microgrid component.

2025-10-29 — arXiv posting stated sufficient stability conditions were provided for the 2 control methods (FBLC and SMC), i.e., formal stability results tied to those 2 methods were claimed in the paper.

2025-10-30 — a correction note posted on arXiv published 1 formal correction identifying 'a pretty serious mistake and some inaccuracies' in Olfati-Saber, Fax, and Murray (2007), explicitly altering the status of that prior result.
